approveEditRecord.name: approveEditRecord
approveEditRecord.description: Approve the edit LicenseeClassPracticeGroup based on the request PK
approveEditRecord.queryString:
update Licenseeclasspracticegroup a
set a.effectiveFromDate = (select b.newEffectiveFromDate from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)
where a.pk=(select b.licenseeclasspracticegroupPk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)
approveEditRecord.countQueryString:
select count(*)  from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)
where a.pk=(select b.licenseeclasspracticegroupPk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)

approvedNewRecord.name: approvedNewRecord
approvedNewRecord.description: Query to Insert a New record into LicenseeClassPracticeGroup on approval
approvedNewRecord.queryString: INSERT INTO Licenseeclasspracticegroup (licenseeFk,isPrimary,effectiveFromDate,effectiveToDate,classPracticeGroupFk) select licenseeFk,newIsPrimary,newEffectiveFromDate,newEffectiveToDate,newClassPracticeGroupFk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals where pk =:primaryKey
